column4: is there a way to get real media playback in totem using the xine backend?
is there a way to get real media playback in totem using the xine backend?
and use medibuntu to get binary codecs

please preface replies with a nick or they're hard to spot - https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu <-- get the w32codecs following this guide and this guide https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats contains full details of everything else
